noRedundantUseStrict.description:
Description

Prevents from having redundant"use strict".
The directive"use strict"isn’tneeded in.mjsfiles, or in.jsfiles inside projects where thepackage.jsondefines library as module:

1{2   "type": "module"3}
Instead,.cjsfiles are considered “scripts” and the directive"use strict"is accepted and advised.
noRedundantUseStrict.option: This rule has no specific options.
